text: I'm seeing the missing translation -- thanks for the heads up --- will get a fix going on our side

Does anyone know how to update the Custom Code action step to apply the number formatting to existing Phone Number values to update the number include the Country Code, in this case it's all USA numbers. I can get the number format to look like this *(978) 123-456*7 but I can't get it to apply the *+1 <tel:(978)123-4567|(978) 123-4567>*
